actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for an exchange of certain private property in Colorado and certain Federal property in Utah.

summary.text: Requires: (1) the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified Federal land in Utah to the owners of specified land in Colorado if the owners of the Colorado land convey their land to the United States; and (2) that as a condition of the conveyance, the recipients of the Utah land must obtain a conservation easement to protect the land's cultural and natural resources.

titles.title: To provide for an exchange of certain private property in Colorado and certain Federal property in Utah.
